Unnamed: 0: Applications of Machine Learning in Facial Cosmetic Surgeries: A Scoping Review
Observations: Includes 2 prediction works that are not related with surgery (facial rejuvenation through dermal fillers); Works mislabelled as outcome prediction; Overall reductive without explaining the technology; Reviewed mostly clinical trials.

Unnamed: 0: A systematic review of generative adversarial networks (GANs) in plastic surgery
Observations: Includes generic description of limitations of GANs, does not provide limitations of each work; Presents list of objective metrics but assumes that all can be simultaneously used to evaluate GAN performance, which is not true as the types of metrics to use depend on the desired output, available data and goal of the GAN
